revised_title: Electron Microscopy of Barium Ferrite Layer Structures: Discovering the Domain Structure and Stacking Sequences
tldr: The authors investigate the barium ferrite layer structures using electron microscopy and lattice imaging techniques. They discover the domain structure and complex stacking sequences within single crystals, revealing compositions and structures not found by X-ray methods. This research provides insights into the ultramicrostructure of these materials and helps understand the ordering forces in their crystal structures.
